schema.description: Request to create a reclamation rule.

license_pool_id.description: The license pool this rule applies to.

lifecycle_state.description: Lifecycle state that triggers reclamation (required for `lifecycle_state` trigger).

notification_days_before.description: Days before reclamation to notify user (default: 7).

threshold_days.description: Days of inactivity before reclamation (required for inactivity trigger).

schema.title: CreateReclamationRuleRequest
